meanings.definition: Rotinis: a type of pasta in the shape of a spiral or helix
meanings.sent1: I cooked a delicious dish using rotinis for dinner.
meanings.sent2: The rotinis were served with a creamy sauce.
meanings.sent3: The playful rotinis danced in the boiling water.
meanings.sent4: Her hair curled like rotinis in the pot.
meanings.sent5: The colorful rotinis looked like tiny springs on the plate.

meanings.definition: Rotinis: the plural form of rotini, referring to multiple pieces of the pasta
meanings.sent1: We bought two packs of rotinis for the party.
meanings.sent2: The rotinis were a hit at the potluck.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous rotinis rolled off the table.
meanings.sent4: The room was filled with the aroma of cooking rotinis.
meanings.sent5: The kids loved the twirls and twists of the rotinis on their forks.

meanings.definition: Rotinis: to cook or prepare rotini pasta for a meal
meanings.sent1: I will rotinis the pasta before adding the sauce.
meanings.sent3: The chef rotinising in the kitchen was a sight to see.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of rotinising pasta filled the house.
meanings.sent5: Rotinising the pasta requires attention to timing and stirring.
